title: Auto connect with other peer and start importing blocks [BUG]

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
My boot node is not mining blocks instead of mining importing from other peers .This also is happening when restart my bootnode.

Here is my boot node logs -
`
ager | No sync target, waiting for peers. Current peers: 2
2022-08-31 13:43:08.566+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-5 | INFO  | FullSyncTargetManager | No sync target, waiting for peers. Current peers: 2
2022-08-31 13:43:11.774+00:00 | pool-7-thread-2 | INFO  | PoWMiningCoordinator | Pausing mining while behind chain head
2022-08-31 13:43:11.777+00:00 | pool-7-thread-2 | INFO  | BlockMiner | Produced #1,763,354 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0xa21cd5715272a843dd21d7f6dcda6649d39ebf71a768c73032de2801edd3e1ee) in 12.226s
2022-08-31 13:43:13.814+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-5 | INFO  | SyncTargetManager | Found common ancestor with peer Peer 0xf1426654db60303c1d... PeerReputation 100, validated? true, disconnected? false at block 1763350
2022-08-31 13:43:15.449+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-5 (importBlock) | INFO  | PoWMiningCoordinator | Resuming mining operations
2022-08-31 13:43:15.694+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-5 | INFO  | SyncTargetManager | Found common ancestor with peer Peer 0xf1426654db60303c1d... PeerReputation 100, validated? true, disconnected? false at block 1763394
2022-08-31 13:43:16.135+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-0 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,397 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0x107fffd68cf34337bd6c368ad85f184968f2ae6de83a97baf2cce3c7b0c93819) in 0.002s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:16.438+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-2 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,397 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0xd3cc9d4f013fb67acee6b8591ba78dde01d39bfabd70f02bacc92ff9a15247f6) in 0.233s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:17.104+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-1 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,398 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0x52e3bda69108655b05e61636ec83875993b9a072880b82979d21dfd56d1e7f48) in 0.001s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:18.096+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-3 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,399 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0x119f7fd001796ce73a4fd1aedebd570a6189d824b0c18b801b83aa685d0578d9) in 0.001s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:19.104+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-0 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,400 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0x47d5dbf72200a0f439d494a056ef1302308367518e8db712e243e1006e8e57ae) in 0.001s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:20.101+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-2 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,401 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0x110cafe943e45f60d495d636a1cf67278d07c9bae36b814f69c0eff26f2548d8) in 0.002s. Peers: 1
2022-08-31 13:43:20.450+00:00 | EthScheduler-Workers-1 | INFO  | PersistBlockTask | Imported #1,763,401 / 0 tx / 0 om / 0 (0.0%) gas / (0xc8fefe7fac0e614db6be730332375414ee451f368ce7de50283b547e1f04df47) in 0.342s. Peers: 1`
bootnodes aren't necessarily mining - these attributes are configured separately. Without more info I think we can close this. @puneet166 reach out if you have further info or need other assistance.
